alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Kohala; Kona; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Warning issued January 17 at 7:14PM HST until January 18 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI MAUI AND FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND THE BIG ISLAND... .A extra large west- northwest (300-320 degree) swell will peak tonight, producing dangerous surf along most north and west facing shores before subsiding Thursday. ...HIGH SURF WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously large breaking waves of 25 to 35 feet surf for north facing shores and 18 to 22 feet for west facing shores. Except 12 to 16 feet for west shores of Big Island. * WHERE...North Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Molokai and Maui. West facing shores of Kauai Oahu Molokai and the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Thursday. * IMPACTS...High. Expect very strong breaking waves and powerful currents. Waves breaking in channel entrances may make navigating the channels dangerous.
info.instruction: Stay away from the shoreline along the affected coasts. Be prepared for road closures. Postpone entering or leaving channels affected by the high surf until the surf subsides.
